title: rambetiko
author: rambetiko
content: Hello. I'm investigating filecoin mining. i have epyc 7f32 and 7302p system. how can i mine filecoin, if i buy 128gb (or 256gb) ram and enough hdd?(100 tb hdd + nvme maybe?)  Is there a video tutorial?Is one system enough or does it have to be more than one?If anyone is filecoin mining, what equipment do they have?thanks for your answers

comments.author: rambetiko
comments.body: I applied but no response. for now my systemepyc 7302p or 7f32 32 gb ecc ram2x rtx3090if i add 128gb ram, can i mining?I can also install a second system with dual processors. or i can make this system dual processor. will that be enough?

comments.author: paid2
comments.body: Quote from: rambetiko on January 29, 2023, 07:12:11 PMI applied but no response. for now my systemepyc 7302p or 7f32 32 gb ecc ram2x rtx3090if i add 128gb ram, can i mining?I can also install a second system with dual processors. or i can make this system dual processor. will that be enough?I don't really know, I always have a look on everything but I am more interested by mining with ASICs, so I wouldn't trick you with a wrong answer.But did you try to ask here : https://discord.com/invite/S7Ew7Xr6z2 ?Their Discord is active and you can certainly find someone able to know exactly what you need to do in your situation

comments.author: fmz89
comments.body: Quote from: rambetiko on January 28, 2023, 09:44:39 PMHello. I'm investigating filecoin mining. i have epyc 7f32 and 7302p system. how can i mine filecoin, if i buy 128gb (or 256gb) ram and enough hdd?(100 tb hdd + nvme maybe?)  Is there a video tutorial?Is one system enough or does it have to be more than one?If anyone is filecoin mining, what equipment do they have?thanks for your answersThe problem with hdd mining that you cant compete with file hosting which is already installed hardware and easy to deploy, no matter how good hdd mining coin, profitable only last weeks, which is bad for investment if you dont have devices already
